name: Loadcave
description:
This is a game for the Brackeysgamejam 2022.1 and also my first Godot game.

You play as this little fellow who has to fine an exit, but there are areas, which are "Not Real" or can not be seen by the Player. Also are there loadblocks, which the Player can activate to make the Cave more easy to navigate.

You can Play with Keyboard:(A,D,SPACE) or Controller(PS,XBOX,SWITCH).
